description: A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets.

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow.

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow, and has been customized with more storage.

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. It's lightly armored, has more pouches, and has a bright yellow 13 on it's back.
A thin, short-sleeved jumpsuit updated for the trans-human who needs full-body clothing.  Provides some storage and is adjustable to minimize encumbrance.
A suit of handmade metal armor. The arms have spiked pauldrons
A strange device, constructed from an odd technology...
A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a snake contorted into an 's'. The jacket makes you feel like you rule.
A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a crown with the words 'The Kings' written in it. Hail to the king, baby.

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. Its decorated with a flame pattern, and has the image of a skull with the words 'Great Khans' on the back. The sleeves were cut off. Brutal.

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a mushroom cloud and a cat, with the words 'atom cats' printed. You feel like a cool cat just wearing this.
A pair of leapard-print pajama pants. Perfect for seduction, or just sleeping.
A leopard-print nightshirt. For when you want to show your sexual prowess in a tacky, yet oddly endearing way.
A green jumpsuit with Chinese flag patches on it. Seems to have been worn by a chinese infiltrator.
A red mechanic's jumpsuit from a tricycle factory. Pockets abound for all your tools and spare parts.
A black jumpsuit worn by Enclave personel. Its not very warm, and is meant to be worn under their armor.
A tough hooded jacket with lots of pockets, thickly padded for warmth.  Favored by the eastern branch of the Enclave.
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets, thickly padded for warmth.  Favored by the eastern branch of the Enclave.
An enclave officer's hat. Black, with the enclave logo above the brim.
A light brown leather full-length duster, worn by the Commonwealth Minutemen, a small, presumably dead group of militiamen.
A thick dark blue duster, once worn by the general of the Commonwealth Minutemen. It's yours now, general.
A thick, red longcoat.  Has many pockets for storage.
A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  It seems to just demand respect.
A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  It seems to just demand respect.
A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  If someone wearing this approaches you, run.

Long, flowing robes.  They are purple, with golden detailings. Just wearing them makes you feel safe. Like some diety is watching over you, influencing every action into your favor... Yet you still feel uneasy.
A great general's hat. Respect the man wearing this.
A great general's hat. Perfect for attacking Russia when you really shouldn't attack Russia.
The hat of pure evil. Do not trust it's wearer.
A burlap sack and a pair of goggles, turned into a menacing mask.
A heavy, round helmet that provides excellent protection from blunt impacts.
A warm ushanka with a disgusting red star on the front.

//: Jason-type costume masks are much cheaper and less protective.
description: A paper-mache mask in the image of a psychotic-looking clown. Its modelled after the infamous serial killer.

//: Jason-type costume masks are much cheaper and less protective.
description: A paper-mache mask in the image of a psychotic-looking clown. Its modelled after the infamous serial killer. Something feels... off about this one.
A black and white plaid suit. Perfect for gamblers, or those just gambling with destiny.
A leather flight jacket covered in military medals.
A simple white set of scientist's scrubs. They lack storage, or durability, but theyre ideal for science.
A tan button-down shirt with long sleeves, and an NCR patch on the front.  Looks professional!
A pair of brown pants with two deep pockets.
A suit of brown body armor used by NCR troopers and rangers. Provides great environmental protection
A suit of handcrafted heavy-steel armor from out west, worn by only the greatest warriors. Well, no traditionalists are here to stop you now.
The helmet of the legate, Caesar's most powerful warrior. It has a face design, and is incredibly beautiful.
A hazmat suit made to protect from foreign materials. It is incredibly durable compared to other similar models, though its a bit bulkier. It needs a separate gas mask.
A soft, red cotton hat. Worn by the NCR's 1st Recon division; 'The last things you'll never see'.
A small bike helmet outfitted with a horned skull.
A thin cotton jacket made to represent a college football team.
A suit of full body green armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its covered in pockets and pouches.
A suit of full body white armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its much warmer than similar armors.

A suit of full body white armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its much warmer than similar armors, though not as protective. It has a large red cross on the back, to signify you're not an active combatant. Sadly, zombies don't recognize the Geneva Convention.
A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.
A heavy winterized helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.
A warm, white covering that protects the head and face from the cold. It's reinforced with Kevlar to protect your face.
